Desh ko lagi desh bhakti pan dekhaune bela aba aaisakyo .pritvi narayan shah le ekikaran gareka jamin bhu bhaag khai ta .sab bharat le hadpi sake sugauli sandhi ma gumeko jamin khai ta nepali le paako .aaja euta greater nepal hunthiyo vane nepal le dherai bikash garna safal hune thiyo .nepal ekikaran garne bela aba aaisakyo sugauli sandhi ko jamin adhikar le paako kura paauna paryo .janta ko mudda liyera rabi g le dherai focus garnu vo ra nayaie dilaunu vo ra aba desh kai lagi mudda utheko kura ma rabi g le action lina parxa sugauli sandhi ko mudda laai agadi badhauna paryo ni .yo sarkar ko matra haina ki 3 crore nepal kai lagi thulo kura ho .haamro 60 hajar barga gumeko jamin kasle phirta dilaune .nepal sarkar kaan ma tel lagayera basi rakheko xa .sarkar laai nepal nai na chaiyeko raixa ra janta ko bhalai chahiyeko rainaxa .yo kura episode marfat sarkar samakxa puryaunu pani jaruri xa ani boleko kura english subtitle pani rakhna jaruri xa jasto mahsus vayo ali kati
